      • update

        public void update​(Project p)
        This method checks whether the information of project p is up to date, depending if we want to add or remove information from user we need to specified it with its parameters
        Parameters:
        p - , the project to be checked

      • ban

        public void ban()
        This method ban a user from the application system, i.e all their votes get removed but the user info and their votes are stored in the system because maybe one day the administrator decides to unban him.

      • unBan

        public void unBan()
        If the user gets unBan, this function restore all the votes that the user had made before get bans

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser()
        This method manages all the synchronization needed in order to remove a user from the system. It can only be use in the situation that a register user is not accepted by the administrator, so he cannot do anything, so it checks it in the fisrt lines.
